title: Неверные
overview: Having lost herself, Olga Shilkovskaya also loses her only son. When her husband takes her child away from her, she decides to return to law practice and makes a career in divorce and family litigation. But saving yourself turns out to be more difficult than becoming a media and successful lawyer. People come to Olga for help when they find themselves in a hopeless situation and there is no way to resolve the conflict peacefully. She finds creative ways out of the situation so as not to bring the case to court. No one knows how hard it really is for her...
